title: BF-Fi
author: BF-Fi
content: Register Now >> https://www.ubetsports.io/sportsbook-tournamentsIt’s already that time... UBET will be live next month! We are super excited to finally see UBET go live on Polygon's mainnet. So far, it has been a long journey. We launched our first tournament in November for the 2022 World Cup. We wouldn’t have been able to make it this far without all of UBettor’s feedback on the UBET platform. For this matter, we have something planned exclusively for our original community members that you will find out soon.We are running the #TestnetFinale tournament before the launch. The main purpose of this tournament is for us to test our live odds updates, new UBET AMM single pool contracts, and deployments! We will kick off the tournament on June 28th and continue until July 19th, 2023 (a total of 3 weeks). The great thing about testnet tournaments is that there is zero risk for UBettors. Participate freely, LFG!  <<< Tournament Registration >>>The Betting tournament is open to all early adopters to experience the UBET platform first-handed and all the feedback from users will be taken into consideration for product improvement. The participants can use this as an opportunity to test their personal betting skills on all ongoing basketball and football leagues available. How do I win?Winners are determined by their ranking on the UBET Tournament leaderboard. We use the UBET point system, which you can find in “Learn how the UBET Leaderboard and the point system work!”.For the top 10 winners, Galactico Manager has prepared 10 football player NFT cards, and we have also allocated 200 USDC prizes.  Plus 300 USDC for the referral programs. For all UBettors, to thank you for your continued support, the referral prize will be handed out to those who successfully refer a winning friend (who will be placed in the top 20 in the tournament). To qualify as a successful referral, UBET members have to invite the friend to UBET’s Discord server, and the friend will have to request UBCKS via Discord so the team can smoothly track the referral mark. Betting Just Got Better: Customer Success Stories ❤️Important note:We use testnet tokens called UBCKS. All UBCKS tokens used for testnet transactions and wagering have no real value. You can use them to bet and climb the leaderboard in order to be in the top 10.Here is a simple step-by-step guide that will guide your registration.We invite you to the UBET Testnet Finale Tournament. Sign-up at ubetsports.io and join our thriving UBET betting community on Discord.Remember, our mission is to transform unfair sports gambling into fair sports trading! “It is a journey, and we begin it now.”UBET is a decentralized sportsbook. We eliminate the house and risk aversion that exist within existing sports prediction market products. Our unique system and architecture will allow all sports fans to trade their predictions when they want at market-implied odds without friction. For more information, visit ubetsports.ioKeep in touch with usDiscord https://discord.gg/destXEjEnWTelegram https://t.me/+bZsj5NzWmhkwYTAxTwitterhttps://twitter.com/UBet__Sports

comments.author: Ubetsports01
comments.body: Esports Betting Research - Get $10USDC for 30 min betting interview!My name is Rushi, and I am the Head of Product and Marketing Lead in UBET Sports. I am conducting a research study to understand the motivations for betting, decision-making processes, and pain points of [Esports] bettors. The purpose of this study is to validate market assumptions and gather valuable insights.1. Sessions will be conducted in English via Zoom or Google Meet (video must be turned on).2. Participation in this session is voluntary and anonymous; no personal information will be captured during the session.3. You will be compensated for your time with a $10USDC ERC20 in Polygon.[/li][/list]To be eligible for this research interview, here are the following requirements:1. You must have been an active esports bettor within the last 6 months.2. Share your betting platform experiences 3. You must be a cs:go blastbettor.If you meet the above requirements and are interested in participating,Please send an email to rushi.yogar@sportsinference.com.Feel free to reach out if you have any questions or concerns regarding the study.I look forward to speaking with you soon.Sincerely,Rushi
